::DarkMouse::

She felt a small chill run up her back as he took her hand.  She 
looked at his face and couldn't help but smile as she looked at him. 
Her hand rested on his shoulder. Her hand tingled as touched his 
shoulder.  She coudn't understand why she suddenly felt her spark try 
to jump out of her chest.  She,for the oddest reason, couldn't take 
her eyes of him.  She then felt scared.  She pulled away from him and 
looked down. She didn't know what to do, but she felt out of place 
all of a sudden. "UH, forgive me commander." she said in a soft 
voice, hoping he wouldn't just shoot her for the heck of it.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
